attributes.action: do something about the growing crisis in  Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No-one seems to be doing anything about Mugube.  Yet millions were spent on an unjust war started by Bush and Blair.  No one is interested because Zimbabwe has no oil or any other comodity yet this dictator is allowed to continue killing and letting the people of Zimbabwe die from chlora and from having no food or water.  The UK government should do something now and not in a few months.   Send the troops into Zimbabwe and get that dictator out
